nuhker

Class SyslogLikeFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • nuhker.SyslogLikeFormatter

  • public class SyslogLikeFormatter
extends java.util.logging.Formatter
    The class describes a Unix Style Syslog formatter which makes java native logging more or less usable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SyslogLikeFormatter() 

    • Method Summary

      java.lang.String format(java.util.logging.LogRecord logRecord)
      A java log formatter meant to override some idiot conventions - for SEVERE reasons, any VERTICAL TABULATION in any logging suxx at a great rate (admins think so, programmers not, thus feel the power!).
